The Filter by Attributes tool returns a subset of a dataset based on an attribute query. The output is a new dataset containing only the records that meet the conditions specified in the query.

The input layer or table to be filtered.

Layer is specified by default when Input dataset is not populated. To add an input table, select Table before adding a dataset.

The attribute query that will be used to filter the input dataset.

The name of the layer that will be created and added to the map.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
